answers.answer: It's weird because I are like I normally eat and passed it

just dont eat 3 hours beforehand. eat alot of carbs today! like bread & what not. I made the mistake of eating before my first test & my results came back bad. then I had to do the 2nd test where they prick you four times in three hours & you cant eat. & that tests ***** way worse than the first. anyways I ate carbs & fasted overnight since it was an early appt & I was fine that time.

question: I'm 26+3 days today and I have geatatinal diabetes test tomorrow and I'm nervous I'm gonna fail it. On the sheet it says not to fast but then my Dr said it makes the results cleaer so I don't know what to do! Mommy's that have already taken it what did you do?
title: glucose test tomorrow.
